scripts.build: npm install -g pnpm && cd frontend && pnpm install --strict-peer-dependencies &&   pnpm run build && cd ../backend && pnpm install --strict-peer-dependencies && cd ../
scripts.install: npm install -g pnpm && cd frontend && pnpm install --strict-peer-dependencies && pnpm run build cd ../backend && pnpm install --strict-peer-dependencies && cd ../
scripts.global-start: npm run install && npm run build && npm run start
